text:
I recently tried upgrading from mod_jk 1.2.35 to 1.2.36 with Apache 2.2.22 on Windows and it doesn't seem to work.  I googled the issue and I see many other people complaining about the same problem but I didn't see any bugs submitted.  I didn't test on Linux but all the other reports I saw when I googled had to do with Windows.  

The error in the mod_jk.log is...
[Thu May 31 11:02:02.047 2012] [11884:8432] [error] ajp_send_request::jk_ajp_common.c (1629): (app) connecting to backend failed. Tomcat is probably not started or is listening on the wrong port (errno=47)
[Thu May 31 11:02:02.047 2012] [11884:8432] [error] ajp_service::jk_ajp_common.c (2642): (app) connecting to tomcat failed.

And one thing of note is that on the JK Status Manager it shows "0.0.0.0" next to localhost under Address:Port as opposed to "127.0.0.1:8009" like it does with 1.2.35.
creator: westmc@gmail.com
mturk@apache.org
text: We have 1.2.37 released which fixes this issue
